thread.title: The world's most subscribed YouTuber PewDiePie launches his debut book to screaming crowds in London
thread.title_full: The world's most subscribed YouTuber PewDiePie launches his debut book to screaming crowds in London

title: The world's most subscribed YouTuber PewDiePie launches his debut book to screaming crowds in London
text:
The world's most subscribed YouTuber PewDiePie launches his debut book to screaming crowds in London The world's most subscribed YouTuber PewDiePie launches his debut book to screaming crowds in London 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
Gaming sensation and funnyman PewDiePie (otherwise known as Felix Kjellberg, for us dinosaurs who aren‚Äôt totally fluent in internet speak) unveiled his debut book to a crowd of enthused fans in London. 
Fans queued for up to five hours to share a hug and a selfie with the world‚Äôs most subscribed YouTuber on the launch of his book, This Book Loves You. (Hannah McKay/PA) 
The 25-year-old has racked up an impressive 39 million subscribers and 10 billion views on his YouTube channel, making him a pretty famous face on the wonderful world of the internet. 
So it‚Äôs not exactly surprising that the crowd outside Waterstones bookshop in Piccadilly, central London, was so big that people were moved inside early to meet the star. (Hannah McKay/PA) 
Felix‚Äôs funny gaming videos, vlogs and LOL-worthy montages have won him fans both young and old. Antonio Rogers, 12, had been chosen to be at the front of the queue with his father, and was waiting next to teenagers who said they arrived five hours early to meet the Swedish gamer. 
Antonio said: ‚ÄúI love PewDiePie so much. He always makes me laugh when I‚Äôm bored and smile when I‚Äôm sad. He‚Äôs amazing.‚Äù Promoted stories 
Lee Rogers, 24, from Kent, added: ‚ÄúI have been watching his content for years so I want to meet the guy. He makes me laugh. I am a bit of a gamer myself but I don‚Äôt have time to do it any more so I watch him.‚Äù 
And of course, everyone was keen to take an all-important selfie with the man himself. @pewdiepie I hope our story made you feel all the feels and pulled your heart strings! üëãüèª I say hello backüë¨ pic.twitter.com/0VlvVAurAa
